lines.text: I ought to buy a lot here. This could catch on.

[Feeling Hunter's ski nose]
Extraodinaire! Formidable! Fantastique!
And that's comin' straight from the horse's mouth!

[after a prolonged kiss with Zara]
Boy, I'm never gonna split a soda with you!

[to Zara as she lights his cigarette]
If we get any closer, we won't need a lighter.
Do you know it's mating season for shellfish? Maybe the lobsters are having a hayride tonight.

[after Fernydel covers his deck chair with a blanket]
What's the cover charge?

[Pointing when a fake octopus appears on a funhouse ride]
Boulliabaise!
It reminds me I got to write my agent.

[Referring to his mental asylum]
We have many actors here - especially since television.

[to Bob]
Will you hold my balloons? The man with the pin is after me.
